img_summary: The image depicts a decorative tray holding a few small, round, seed-like objects. Based on the context, it is likely associated with the "Golden Lotus Seeds," an uncommon seed item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. These seeds are described as being randomly obtained by defeating the Golden Lotus Guai, suggesting their role as collectible or crafting materials in the game.
